SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.phone_number, e.hire_date, e.manager_id, e.email, e.department_id, d.department_name, j.job_title FROM EMPLOYEES e, departments d, jobs j where e.department_id = d.department_id and e.job_id = j.job_id
ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID
